Tyler Loughery

a.k.a. Droogie

& Kilroy

Tyler has been into all kinds of music but litimiatly found his way to punk. Whether it is Death Grips underground sound, or Nirvana.

  • Born and raised together in Northwest Philadelphia, ABBATIA was seemingly destined to take root.
  • The unkempt trio of Syd Solanke, Jazz Vicaris, and Droogie have been creating together for virtually
  • their entire lives before arriving upon the demented sonic hellscapes under the ABBATIA heraldry.
  • Each member contributes vocals to the industrial walls of sound constructed by Syd, while Droogie creates
  • the vibrant, restless visuals that accompany their music. The group takes influence from classic hip-hop ands
  • punk in its purest form, as well as from surrealist film and litra-violent manga. While they sclipt their debut album, ABBATIA will be releasing a trilogy of EPs
  • in early 2022 that will act as stepping stones to something greater. The future of ABBATIA is formless,
  • spanning all genres and mlitimedia. With every new release, a brick is laid on the church’s foundation.
  • Take a boat ride… to ABBATIA.
